: du

subSubSection.paragraph:
H o s t
Philanthus capensis DAHLBOM 1845
( Hymenoptera : Crabronidae ).

D i s t r i b u t i o n: Central African Republic , " Congo ", Democratic Republic of Congo , Djibouti , Eritrea , Ethiopia , Guinea Bissau , Kenya , Mozambique , Rwanda , Senegal , Sudan , South Africa , Zambia .

Known from the Palaearctic Region.
Hedychrum coelestinum chloroticum
du BUYSSON is not mentioned in BISCHOFF (1913) and KIMSEY & BOHART (1990).
